author: Suhasini Haidar
title: Coronavirus | ‘Trace, test, treat’ mantra helped us control the virus, says South Korean Ambassador to India Shin Bong-Kil
description: Extensive testing was crucial in preventing spread of COVID-19 without drastic lockdowns, says Ambassador Shin.
content: The Korean Model, a vigorous regime of trace, test, treat, has shown remarkable results in controlling the spread and mortality of the novel coronavirus, without putting a nationwide lockdown in place, and depended on conducting as many as 18,000 tests a day,… [+6578 chars]
